extendedInfo.description: Fun Letters Learning App for Kids!Cute animal friends will help your children in learning and Each one is helping with something else - this time using jobs like doctor, surgeon, dentist etc. (similar to Elephant Letter Lunchbox where they learn with animals like monkey, elephant, ostrich etc.).Kids will have fun and in the same they will learn different things (like letters, vehicle names, spelling).It is fun for all and educational at the same time.Before releasing I showed this to my daughter and I couldn`t get my phone back - that`s how I make sure kids will enjoy my apps.Free version contains 5 items to discover with ads, colorful graphics and cute animal friends - this makes this app a blast.Your child can easily flip between pictures and have fun playing sounds and letters, it is so much fun that kids do not even notice that they are learning at the same time.Features:* Easy to use - swiping, shaking, tapping that`s what kids love the most!
